column4: im on a laptop with an intel pentium m 1.5ghz and radeon 9200 vid card, and the comp is having trouble playing dvds and xvid / divx files.  any thoughts?
yeah.  little jerky, sound is out of sync, etc.
My DVD playback was a little jerky, but it's perfect now... the only thing I remember is rebooting. Nothing else.
im playing this from my hd, but, how do i do that too?  =)
